//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "fake_guard", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	use ( "fake_door" );

	task ( "run to cover" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK_SPEED", "10 - Emergency" );
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "fake_cover" );
	}

	dowait ( "run to cover" );
}
